solution_line_template: Jade drives for a total of {trip_days} days x {jade_hours_per_day} hours/day = <<{trip_days}*{jade_hours_per_day}={jade_total_hours}>>{jade_total_hours} hours
Krista drives for a total of {trip_days} days x {krista_hours_per_day} hours/day = <<{trip_days}*{krista_hours_per_day}={krista_total_hours}>>{krista_total_hours} hours
Together they drive {jade_total_hours} hours + {krista_total_hours} hours = <<{jade_total_hours}+{krista_total_hours}={total_driving_hours}>>{total_driving_hours} hours
